author: Henry VIII, King of England, 1491-1547.
notes: A dialogue between a lawyer and a divine concerning Henry VIII's proposed divorce from Catherine of Aragon.
Printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Henry --  VIII, --  King of England, 1491-1547 --  Early works to 1800.
